messages.title: My pledge to you
messages.content: I was born and raised here on the Suffolk coast.

messages.title: Getting the economy right
messages.content: You only need to look down Hamilton Road in Felixstowe or Woodbridge Road...

messages.title: Cleaning up politics
messages.content: Politicians should serve at a national level for no longer than two terms...

messages.title: Four steps to a fairer Britain
messages.content: Fairer taxes to put money back in your pocket for you to keep the first £10,000 you earn...

messages.title: A better education - for all our futures
messages.content: Thanks to Labour and Tory government cuts, local schools...

messages.title: Health matters
messages.content: Suffolk's health service seems to lurch from one crisis to another...

messages.title: Not costing the earth
messages.content: Nothing matters more than looking after our planet for future generations...

messages.title: Fairness for older people
messages.content: People should not have to sell their homes to pay for care...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce Tax Cuts for Millions, ensuring no income tax on first £10,000
Invest extra £2.5bn in schools, paid for from savings by cutting trident
Create jobs by making Britain greener; invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient homes
Give NHS staff a say in decisions and local people more power over the police and local services

issues.economy: Getting the economy right section discusses economic issues and local impacts.
issues.education: A better education - for all our futures section covers education policy and school funding.
issues.environment: Not costing the earth section talks about environmental concerns and green technology.
issues.governance: Cleaning up politics section discusses term limits for politicians.
issues.health: Health matters section addresses the state of health services.

housing.content: Fairness for older people section addresses the issue of selling homes to pay for care.

leaflet.personalStatement: My pledge to you section includes Daisy Cooper's personal statement and background.

images.caption: Image of Daisy Cooper campaigning and interacting with constituents.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet uses personal engagement and local knowledge to appeal to constituents.
